summary:
Draco: Harry, what’s that?
Harry: My back
Draco: And what is that thing written on your back?!
Harry: uhhh... Your name. Do you...
body:
Draco: Harry, what’s that?

Harry: My back

Draco: And what is that thing written on your back?!

Harry: uhhh… Your name. Do you like it?

Draco(tearing up): Its fine

summary:
Scorpius: good morning Father, Grandfather
Draco: what are you saying Scorpius? Grandfather is at his Manor at the...
body:
Scorpius: good morning Father, Grandfather

Draco: what are you saying Scorpius? Grandfather is at his Manor at the moment

Scorpius: but last night I heard Father calling Dad “Daddy”, doesnt that make Dad my grandfather?

Draco:

Harry:

Harry: *whispers to Draco* i told you to keep your voice down

summary: Update! In a World of Deception Crossover: Inuyasha/Harry Potter Rated: T Adventure/Humor/Angst/Romance Harry P./Kagome H....
body:
Update!

In a World of Deception
Crossover: Inuyasha/Harry Potter

Rated: T
Adventure/Humor/Angst/Romance

Harry P./Kagome H.
Words: 189,862, Chapters: 33/40(??), In-Progress

When word gets out that the jewel is not only real but is also in the modern era, the good and evil sides of the Wizard Community are in a race for it, bent on either protecting or abusing it - with Kagome stuck in the middle. From half-truths and secrets to lies and outright deception, nothing is what it really seems for Kagome. Even her friends have their own hidden agenda. Harry x Kagome

Chapter 33 via:

FFN

AO3

Catch Up via:

FFN

AO3

summary: Has anyone seen that thing where you put "will Percy Jackson ever die" into Greek google translate and then translate it back to...
body: Has anyone seen that thing where you put “will Percy Jackson ever die” into Greek google translate and then translate it back to English? If you haven’t, do it. So, I saw something that said if you type in “will Harry Potter ever die” into Greek google translate (and I’ll spoil this one) it says “the potter will have to die.” Pretty freaky, right? But I thought… Greek isn’t really the right language to search it in, right? Because that doesn’t have any connection to the series. So I switched it to Latin, because… You know. And… I won’t spoil anything… Just do it. Spread it. And DON’T SPOIL IT.

reblog.comment: Has anyone seen that thing where you put “will Percy Jackson ever die” into Greek google translate and then translate it back to English? If you haven’t, do it. But I thought… Greek isn’t really the right language to search it in, right? Because that doesn’t have any connection to the series. So I switched it to Latin, because… You know. And… I won’t spoil anything… Just do it. Spread it. And DON’T SPOIL IT.

So, I saw something that said if you type in “will Harry Potter ever die” into Greek google translate (and I’ll spoil this one) it says “the potter will have to die.” Pretty freaky, right? But I thought… Greek isn’t really the right language to search it in, right? Because that doesn’t have any connection to the series. So I switched it to Latin, because… You know. And… I won’t spoil anything… Just do it. Spread it. And DON’T SPOIL IT.

But I thought… Greek isn’t really the right language to search it in, right? Because that doesn’t have any connection to the series. So I switched it to Latin, because… You know. And… I won’t spoil anything… Just do it. Spread it. And DON’T SPOIL IT.

summary: Unpopular opinion but instead of hating on other ships and shippers why don’t you uplift your own goddamn ship even if it’s not...
body:
Unpopular opinion but instead of hating on other ships and shippers why don’t you uplift your own goddamn ship even if it’s not canon?

Ship wars don’t start because of ships. They start because people are immature enough to not accept the possibility that not everyone has the same taste.

reblog.comment:
Unpopular opinion but instead of hating on other ships and shippers why don’t you uplift your own goddamn ship even if it’s not canon?

summary: Keep You Warm, Bring You Home
title: Keep You Warm, Bring You Home
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2KRfyGW

by AmeliaDarkholme

“Because you’re my brother, you great git! And that blond prat is practically Sirius’ brother too! You’re our family! I don’t care what some stupid prophecy from thousands of years ago told you. There is no way Sirius and I are letting you two fight Voldemort alone.”

When he saved Arthur all those centuries ago, Merlin knew that he was going to face lifetimes of heartache and broken-heart. But finally, it was coming to an end. He knew it. He could feel it. He could feel him. Even with dark times ahead of him, he was ready. As long as he had his clotpole by his side, he would the end of the world with a smile on his face.

Words: 22687, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling, Merlin (TV)
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Major Character Death
  • Categories: F/M, M/M
  • Characters: Merlin (Merlin), Arthur Pendragon (Merlin), James Potter, Sirius Black, Narcissa Black Malfoy, Andromeda Black Tonks
  • Relationships: Merlin/Arthur Pendragon (Merlin), James Potter/Lily Evans Potter, Sirius Black/Marlene McKinnon, Lucius Malfoy/Narcissa Black Malfoy, Andromeda Black Tonks/Ted Tonks, Sirius Black & James Potter, Narcissa Black Malfoy & Andromeda Black Tonks
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe, Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence, Reincarnation


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2KRfyGW
